about_the_game:
ATMOSPHERE
Immerse in an organic gaming experience and let yourself be carried away by the captivating atmosphere of Los Páramos. A house and a garden is all this play needs, with detailed scenarios that speak for themselves. The shelves and desks are full of books that hide the secrets of this fantastic world called Asthar, where doesn´t exist the day light. That's how it is, the esperience takes place during an infinite night sky.



ABOUT THE GAME
In Los Páramos you will embody the young Ágata, her love for reading will embark you on an incredible adventure, full of exploration, history, and convoluted situations that you can overcome through your intellect.
She interacts, reads, understands...

GAMEPLAY
We recommend to begin this game without knowing much, to live a better experience, despite this we are going to talk about the gameplay below, you have been warned.

  • An environment surrounded by knowledge
    You find yourself in a house full of books, which you can read in a simulated way to the real ones. Knowledge is knowing. And without him it would be impossible to advance in Los Páramos. The books will teach you everything from incredible stories, to how to learn strange spells, but beware, the recipes themselves will be a challenge, and more and more.

  • Apprentice Magician
    As we said, the spells are obtained with recipes, so you will have to gather the necessary ingredients if you want to get them. As well as discovering its way of elaboration. These spells will help you to continue exploring and entering the corners of the house.

  • Creativity
    In Los Páramos you can interact with many objects and things in the environment, as well as use your spells in many different ways. Be creative and discover the secrets that await you there. Things are often not what they seem, but don't forget to read the books. For Ágata to be a good learner, she first has to be a good student.

  • She Lives your way [/]
    She does not have to be any end, just relax and take a walk around the environment enjoying the landscape and the setting. After all, you are at home.[/list]



    FREEDOM
    Anyone can´t tell you how to play neither what to do, your imagination is the limit, you'll can interact the way you want and in the order you want. Experiment, dare, try and break the limits. This is not a common jigsaw game, you will never see the topic password panel, trying to be as organic as possible.



    HISTORY
    The story of the game is based on Kronux, a work of Isa, mysleepyblue. Set in a medieval fantasy world with its own mythology. Ágata is one of the most important characters in her work, a girl eager for knowledge who has lived for years in the house in Los Páramos, in the middle of the forest and away from everything.

name: Los Páramos

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RX 560
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 970
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Los Páramos is an unique experience in which magic and fantasy converge in a mysterious house with secrets to reveal. You will embody Ágata, a young girl who loves to read antique books, in a place far from all civilization.
supported_languages:
English, Spanish - Spain*
*languages with full audio support
